contentMetaTitle: VidLive | Embed Live Facebook, YouTube Feed To Your Website
contentMetaDescription: One Time Embed — Automatically Embed Your Live Facebook, YouTube Stream Video On Your Website. Just Add Our Embed Once and You're Done! Give It A Try.
heroSubTitle: Copying and pasting embed codes every time you go live is a hassle.
heroSubTitle2: Oh... and it works with your
providerTitle: Works with all your favorite social providers
featuresTitle: Everything you need to run your books.
featuresSubTitle: Well everything you need if you aren’t that picky about minor details like tax compliance.
featuresTab1SubTitle: Keep track of everyone's salaries and whether or not they've been paid. Direct deposit not supported.
featuresTab2SubTitle: All of your receipts organized into one place, as long as you don't mind typing in the data by hand.
featuresTab3SubTitle: We only sell our software to companies who don't deal with VAT at all, so technically we do all the VAT stuff they need.
featuresTab4SubTitle: Easily export your data into an Excel spreadsheet where you can do whatever the hell you want with it.
moreInfo1Title: Stay on top of customer support

ctaSubTitle: It’s time to take control of your books. Buy our software so you can feel like you’re doing something productive.
testimonialSubTitle: 1000's of people use VidLive daily. Join thousands of churches, instructors, gamers, and more who use VidLive to embed Facebook Live on their website to engage and grow audiences.
faqSubTitle: Our software is so simple that people can’t help but fall in love with it. Simplicity is easy when you just skip tons of mission-critical features.
faqFirstQuestion: Works with 99.9% of the web builders & eCommerce platforms
faqFirstAnswer: Add the one time embed code to your webpage. Works with virtually any website or CMS.
